name: ZomZom
description:
ZomZom, currently a Prototype, you can only Explore, Test the Shoot Mechanics, Drive around with a Car and find Bugs at the moment, more will be added soon.

No Main Menu yet, will be coming this Week | Today is the 5/7/2020

You can find Weapons in the Church and at the Spawn.

Your Car is the Black Armored Buggy

You can change Weapon Modes from Single Shot to Burst and Fullauto with the B Key

Movement is the same as in any other Game

Inventory on Tab Key

Get in/out a Vehicle with E Key

Day/Night Time Cycle is also activated, as well as Clouds which rotate.

My Discord : kokoracha#0609
